controllers

Class CalibrateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • controllers.Controller
        • controllers.CalibrateController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, SensorListener

    public class CalibrateController
extends Controller
    This controller calibrates the light sensors. You need to put the sensors first on the white line and then on the black line.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Noah Steijlen, Scott Mackay, Bouke Stam, Timon van den Brink
